channel.description: Week 6 Announcements This Week Today: Discuss 1 Wed: Lab 3 Quizzes Next Tues: Lab 3 & Discuss 2 Lab 3 Core Network Services Set IP Addresses Install DNS & DHCP Install SNMP See Hints & Diagrams Ask Questions! Lab 3 Grading Remote (RDP & SSH) Static IP on Ubuntu DNS Server Settings DNS Lookups DHCP Settings SNMP & Wireshark Pics Lab 4 Windows Server VM Active Directory OpenLDAP Configure Clients Configure Interop MAKE SNAPSHOTS Success Read Carefully See Posted Hints Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Speaker: Seth Galitzer Engg. IT Manager Formerly CS Sysadmin K-State CS Grad Tuesday 9/30 2:30 PM Speaker: Kyle Hutson Lambda Labs https://lambdalabs.com/ Formerly KANREN Formerly Beocat Tuesday 10/7 2:30 PM Fully Remote This Week Wed through Fri Email responses slower Email for appt. Will get back to you! Keep in Touch! Ed Discussion Discord & Teams "Tea Time" Office Hours One-on-One Office Hours
